name: Re: Wand
description:
Re: Wand

The wand chooses the wizard, Mr. Potter. It's not always clear why. But I think it is clear that we can expect great things from you. After all, He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named did great things. Terrible! Yes. But great. - Ollivander, Harry Potter 

Embark in an epic adventure as a wand, defeating monsters and acquiring more power. 

Movement

drag your card to the next column or the previous column. 

The game has gif tutorials so pay attention to them!

Tips
  •  If you are starting out, ALWAYS pick the middle reward, the (campfire)
  • Rewinding is not a gimmick in this game. To WIN, you MUST rewind
